name: WoG Series Medium Fantasy aRPG (First Slice)
name_original: WoG Series Medium Fantasy aRPG (First Slice)
description:
Workshop of Gameplay Series: Medium Fantasy aRPG (First Slice)

It's nice to have a place to let you order first playable version of Medium Fantasy aRPG.

Till summer for sure it stay's in early acces, but I will try to upload on my account next episodes propably monthly. Donations are nice to be seen.

Have a fun !
